WorkItem.Description: Dunno what exactly you guys did recently to mess with relevancy, but it looks like you forgot to apply base.IsItemRelevant(item) or something, cause it's showing all sorts of items that it shouldn't (like DK-specific items). Also, if you're going to have a 'Hide bad items' checkbox, make sure that there's a tooltip on it, explaining exactly what it's hiding, and try not to overlap with the built in 'refine types of items listed' feature.

Comments.Message: The 'Hide Bad Items' is stat based, not item-type based (like an item having Hit for Healadin). I also didn't notice any items that would be for like DK's or anything showing up where it wouldn't have otherwise, I'll double-check it. Turning it off uses original default behavior, at least it should be.
I was seeing DK and Pally items, with and without that checked, and verified that they were marked as DK-only or Pally-only.
i just committed a fix for it, can you double-check that you still see the same thing? I'll come back and add a tooltip tonight
